20101229073828.000|20101229073828.000|CC1|HIM?                            
20101229073828.000|20101229073833.000|CC1|>> HE'S COMPASSIONATE, HE'S

20101229073843.000|20101229073846.000|CC1|YOU LIVE TODAY AS IF IT MIGHT BE

20101229073847.000|20101229073849.000|CC1|>> YEAH, I THINK THAT'S THE MOST
20101229073849.000|20101229073852.000|CC1|IMPORTANT OF THEM ALL IS TO     
20101229073852.000|20101229073854.000|CC1|REMIND THE PEOPLE THAT YOU LOVE 
20101229073854.000|20101229073856.000|CC1|HOW MUCH YOU LOVE HIM AND MAYBE 
20101229073856.000|20101229073857.000|CC1|THERE'S NOT TOMORROW.           
20101229073857.000|20101229073858.000|CC1|NOT FOR YOURSELF BUT FOR THAT   
20101229073858.000|20101229073901.000|CC1|PERSON THAT YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO
20101229073901.000|20101229073904.000|CC1|SAY HOW MUCH THAT PERSON MEANT  
20101229073904.000|20101229073906.000|CC1|TO YOU.                         
20101229073906.000|20101229073908.000|CC1|I THINK THE MOVIE "BIUTIFUL"    
20101229073908.000|20101229073908.000|CC1|SPEAKS ABOUT THAT ALSO.         
20101229073908.000|20101229073910.000|CC1|>> Rose: HOW MUCH DID YOUR      
20101229073910.000|20101229073911.000|CC1|PARENTS SHAPE WHO YOU ARE TODAY 
20101229073911.000|20101229073916.000|CC1|IN TERMS OF CHOICES YOU'VE MADE?
20101229073916.000|20101229073918.000|CC1|>> I WOULD SAY A LOT ALONG WITH 
20101229073918.000|20101229073919.000|CC1|MY FRIENDS.                     
20101229073919.000|20101229073922.000|CC1|MY MOTHER HAS WORKED REALLY HARD
20101229073922.000|20101229073924.000|CC1|IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN DIGNITY IN 
20101229073924.000|20101229073927.000|CC1|A PROFESSION-- ACTRESS-- THAT   
20101229073927.000|20101229073928.000|CC1|WHEN SHE WAS AN ACTRESS IN SPAIN
20101229073928.000|20101229073931.000|CC1|WITH A DICTATORSHIP THEY WERE   
20101229073931.000|20101229073935.000|CC1|ACCUSED OF BEING SOMETHING LESS 
20101229073935.000|20101229073938.000|CC1|THAN AN EVIL PERSON.            
20101229073938.000|20101229073939.000|CC1|I'M ALWAYS SAYING THAT THE      
20101229073939.000|20101229073940.000|CC1|PARENTS OF MY GRANDPARENTS WERE 
20101229073940.000|20101229073942.000|CC1|ACTORS IN A TIME WHEN ACTORS    
20101229073942.000|20101229073946.000|CC1|WERE NOT ALLOWED TO BE BURIED ON
20101229073946.000|20101229073947.000|CC1|SACRED LAND.                    
20101229073947.000|20101229073949.000|CC1|SO THAT'S HOW FAR MY GENERATION 
20101229073949.000|20101229073951.000|CC1|IN THE FAMILY OF ACTORS ARE     
20101229073951.000|20101229073955.000|CC1|COMING FROM.                    
20101229073955.000|20101229073957.000|CC1|SHE TALKED TO ME ABOUT EARNING  
20101229073957.000|20101229073958.000|CC1|THE PLACE.                      
20101229073958.000|20101229074000.000|CC1|EARNING WHAT YOU HAVE THROUGH   
20101229074000.000|20101229074002.000|CC1|THE WORK, THROUGH THE RESPECT...
20101229074002.000|20101229074004.000|CC1|THROUGH THE RESPECT TO OTHERS.  
20101229074004.000|20101229074005.000|CC1|AND THAT'S SOMETHING THAT I     
20101229074005.000|20101229074009.000|CC1|TRIED TO DO EVERYDAY.           
20101229074009.000|20101229074010.000|CC1|>> Rose: IF YOU LOOK AT SOME OF 
20101229074010.000|20101229074012.000|CC1|THOSE FILMS THAT WE SAW AND     
20101229074012.000|20101229074013.000|CC1|THOSE CHARACTERS THAT WE PLAYED,
20101229074013.000|20101229074015.000|CC1|DO YOU SEE ANY RHYTHM THERE?    
20101229074015.000|20101229074016.000|CC1|DO YOU SEE ANYTHING THAT SAYS...
20101229074016.000|20101229074017.000|CC1|(LAUGHS)                        
20101229074017.000|20101229074018.000|CC1|>> I SEEK OUT THE RHYTHM.       
20101229074018.000|20101229074020.000|CC1|I SEEK OUT THE RHYTHM.          
20101229074020.000|20101229074022.000|CC1|I SEE 20 YEARS GOING...         
20101229074022.000|20101229074024.000|CC1|>> Rose: WHAT WAS I THINKING?

20101229075508.000|20101229075510.000|CC1|THAT BECAUSE THE SOCIETY IN     
20101229075510.000|20101229075514.000|CC1|SPAIN IS SUPPORTING THAT PEOPLE

20101229075517.000|20101229075520.000|CC1|35 YEARS HAS HAD THE GUTS TO    
20101229075520.000|20101229075523.000|CC1|FACE MOROCCO AND SAY "THAT IS   
20101229075523.000|20101229075525.000|CC1|WRONG."                         
20101229075525.000|20101229075527.000|CC1|AND SPAIN IS A KEY COUNTRY IN   
20101229075527.000|20101229075530.000|CC1|THAT, AS MUCH AS UNITED STATES  
20101229075530.000|20101229075531.000|CC1|AND FRANZ.                      
20101229075531.000|20101229075532.000|CC1|>> Rose: WHAT ELSE SHOULD SPAIN 
20101229075532.000|20101229075535.000|CC1|BE PREPARED TO DO FOR THOSE?    
20101229075535.000|20101229075539.000|CC1|>> SUPPORT IN THE EUROPEAN      
20101229075539.000|20101229075541.000|CC1|COMMUNITY AND THE UNITED        
20101229075541.000|20101229075542.000|CC1|NATIONS.

20101229075551.000|20101229075555.000|CC1|NATIONS AND EUROPE PARLIAMENT

20101229082049.000|20101229082051.000|CC1|WE SHARE IN THE BEGINNING OF THE
20101229082051.000|20101229082053.000|CC1|JOURNEY WAS VERY WELL THOUGHT, I
20101229082053.000|20101229082054.000|CC1|THINK.                          
20101229082054.000|20101229082055.000|CC1|I THINK THERE WAS A LOT OF      
20101229082055.000|20101229082057.000|CC1|PLANNING AND TO SEE ALL THE     
20101229082057.000|20101229082059.000|CC1|PERIODS OF THESE CHARACTERS     
20101229082059.000|20101229082100.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT'S A DIFFICULT ONE.   
20101229082100.000|20101229082102.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO DESIGN IT IN A VERY 
20101229082102.000|20101229082106.000|CC1|PRECISE, METICULOUS WAY.        
20101229082106.000|20101229082108.000|CC1|SO IT LOOKS VERY NATURAL BUT    
20101229082108.000|20101229082110.000|CC1|EVERYTHING IS PREDESIGNED AND A 
20101229082110.000|20101229082114.000|CC1|LOT OF WORK BEHIND THAT.        
20101229082114.000|20101229082116.000|CC1|>> THIS THISRY MINDS ME OF      
20101229082116.000|20101229082119.000|CC1|PENELOPE AND PEDRO, YES?        
20101229082119.000|20101229082121.000|CC1|>> OF THE WORK, YOU MEAN?       
20101229082121.000|20101229082121.000|CC1|>> Rose: YEAH.                  
20101229082121.000|20101229082124.000|CC1|THE KIND OF COLLABORATION.

20101229082127.000|20101229082130.000|CC1|PENELOPE.

20101229082131.000|20101229082138.000|CC1|>> NO, BUT I GUESS IT'S         
20101229082138.000|20101229082138.000|CC1|IMPOSSIBLE TO COMPARE ONE TO THE
20101229082138.000|20101229082139.000|CC1|OTHER.

20101229082145.000|20101229082146.000|CC1|THE MOUNTAINS.

20101229082148.000|20101229082149.000|CC1|KNOW ABOUT THAT.                
20101229082149.000|20101229082150.000|CC1|BUT I GUESS WHEN YOU DO THAT THE
20101229082150.000|20101229082153.000|CC1|MOUNTAIN IS HIGH AND TOUGH.     
20101229082153.000|20101229082154.000|CC1|THERE ARE MANY STAGES THAT      
20101229082154.000|20101229082157.000|CC1|YOU'RE GOING THROUGH UNTIL YOU

20101229082207.000|20101229082209.000|CC1|VERY ROUGH AND VERY COLD AND    
20101229082209.000|20101229082211.000|CC1|EMOTIONALLY AND PHYSICALLY      
20101229082211.000|20101229082212.000|CC1|EXHAUSTING FOR HIM AND FOR ME.  
20101229082212.000|20101229082216.000|CC1|WE WERE KIND OF... IT WAS SBIFLT
20101229082216.000|20101229082217.000|CC1|IT WAS INTENSE.                 
20101229082217.000|20101229082219.000|CC1|>> Rose: THE MUSIC IS IMPORTANT.
20101229082219.000|20101229082220.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101229082220.000|20101229082221.000|CC1|SENATE TO NOT ONLY RAVEL BUT... 
20101229082221.000|20101229082222.000|CC1|>> I THINK AGAIN TO HAVE THE    
20101229082222.000|20101229082226.000|CC1|PRIVILEGE TO WORK AND WITH MY   
20101229082226.000|20101229082227.000|CC1|TEAM, WITH ALL MY FAMILY, YOU   
20101229082227.000|20101229082228.000|CC1|KNOW?                           
20101229082228.000|20101229082232.000|CC1|AND I THINK THAT IN THIS CASE IT
20101229082232.000|20101229082233.000|CC1|WAS ONE THE MOST DIFFICULT FILMS
20101229082233.000|20101229082235.000|CC1|TO FIND THE RIGHT MUSIC, THE    
20101229082235.000|20101229082236.000|CC1|RIGHT VOICE.                    
20101229082236.000|20101229082237.000|CC1|AND AFTER 200 TRACKS WE ENDED UP

20101229082242.000|20101229082245.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE A C.D. THAT WE'LL 
20101229082245.000|20101229082246.000|CC1|CALL "BIUTIFUL" AND ANOTHER     
20101229082246.000|20101229082249.000|CC1|TRACK THAT WE'LL CALL "ALMOST   
20101229082249.000|20101229082250.000|CC1|"BIUTIFUL"" MOST OF THE TRACKS

20101229082251.000|20101229082255.000|CC1|I THINK THE D.N.A. WAS DONE     
20101229082255.000|20101229082257.000|CC1|IS... HITS THE RIGHT CHORDS IN

20101229082329.000|20101229082331.000|CC1|FUNNILY ENOUGH, SPAIN SELECTS   
20101229082331.000|20101229082337.000|CC1|THE FILM TO REPRESENT SPAIN SCHS
20101229082337.000|20101229082341.000|CC1|SHOT IN BOLIVIA WITH THE LEADER 
20101229082341.000|20101229082341.000|CC1|OF THAT FAME.                   
20101229082341.000|20101229082344.000|CC1|SO IT'S A FUNNY THING THAT IN   
20101229082344.000|20101229082347.000|CC1|THE 200 YEARS OF CELEBRATION OF 
20101229082347.000|20101229082349.000|CC1|INDEPENDENCE OF THOSE COUNTRIES 
20101229082349.000|20101229082353.000|CC1|CINEMA ARE PROVING THAT IT'S    
20101229082353.000|20101229082355.000|CC1|INTERDEPENDENCE AND BUILDING
